safetyTips: We use Royal mail and APC Wilkinsons for our delivery service who adhere to the government social distancing measures.  For collections they are placed outside in our collection box, so there is no interaction with customers.  In the office we use sanitising gels.
name: ROMNEY MARSH WOOLS
address: Rushfield, Giggers Green Road, Aldington, Ashford, Kent, TN25 7BT
description: Romney Marsh Wools is owned and run by Kristina & Paul Boulden and was born through a firm belief in raising the awareness of all the benefits wool can bring.  A wide range of products are produced using their own Romney wool including throws, clothing, gifts, toiletries and much more. Available for Delivery & Collection.
